title: Import & Customs Clearance
description: We simplify the process of bringing goods into Ethiopia by handling all import procedures, customs clearance, and compliance requirements. Our team ensures your shipments arrive safely and legally without unnecessary delays.

title: Wholesale Distribution
description: GreenGate supplies high-quality goods directly to Ethiopian businesses, wholesalers, and retailers. From everyday products to specialized equipment, we deliver reliable solutions tailored to local market needs.

title: Logistics & Delivery
description: We provide efficient transportation and last-mile delivery services across Ethiopia. With trusted logistics partners, we make sure your goods move securely and on time â€” from port to warehouse to customer.

title: Product Sourcing for Local Businesses
description: Looking for specific products from China or other countries? We help Ethiopian businesses source the right items at competitive prices, with guaranteed quality and trustworthy suppliers.

title: Business Support & Representation
description: For international companies entering Ethiopia, GreenGate acts as a local partner and representative, guiding you through regulations, licensing, and partnerships. We bridge international opportunities with local market realities.
